name: Guns'n'Carrots
description:
Good news for you:
Your sheriff would gallop forward and shoot automatically. Since you cannot aim, your goal is to pick up weapons with particular bullets and use carrot for repositioning up and down the screen.

The team:

  • Idea and Code - Razenpok
  • Levels and Mechaics - Linver
  • Art and ani - WermoongRey
  • Awesome soundtrack - Holyghost

Also we thank Zapsplat.com for sound FX.
